paper name: TWEETSUMM - A Dialog Summarization Dataset for Customer Service
how was it collected: structed from Tweets that appear in the Kaggle Customer Support On Twitter dataset2 , each accompanied by 3 extractive and 3 abstractive summaries generated by human annotators. When generating the extractive summary, the annotators were instructed to highlight the most salient sentences in the dialog. For the abstractive summaries, they were instructed to write a summary that contains one sentence summarizing what the customer conveyed and a second sentence summarizing what the agent responded.
comments: this is also a two phased annotations first extractive then abstractive
